WITH ALL OF THE ISSUES WITH THE BANKERS PROBLEMS.  AND NOT MUCH RECRIMINATION . IS IT NOT TIME TO GIVE THIS MAN HIS HONOUR BACK
    HOW MANY ROCK STARS HAVE CONVICTIONS  FOR DRUG CHARGES,  IF LESTER HAD BEEN A JUNKIE  WOULD HE HAVE BEEN TREATED THE SAME. OUR BELOVED KEN DODD  STILL HAS HIS HONOUR  AND I THINK HE WOULD BE THE FIRST TTO SIGN,
     i am just a normal retired person  who thinks that if there is any justice in the world  we should support this
                          thanks
